entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 08:53 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
